subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king founded the city of Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जयसलमर के मूल केलेंग किस Rajput king थे।
explanation_en: Rao Bhim Singh is the correct answer as he founded the city of Jaisalmer in 1156 AD.
explanation_hi: यहां सही उत्तराधिका है कि Rao Bhim Singh ji 1156 AD mein Jaisalmer ko nishani laga diya और इसको बढ़ता है इसका समझ।

subject: Rajasthan History

explanation_en: Prince Suraj Mal founded Jaipur in the 14th century.
